name: Commander's Leadership Corps
description: The CLC is a men's discipleship and apologetic ministry which incorporates in depth Bible study with practical application, while reinforcing a vibrant Christian worldview.
meeting_time: Every Thursday at 6:30 in the evening
leader_bio: David has served as the pastor of the Cranesville Bible Church since 2005. He graduated from Pensacola Christian College in 2002, and followed that with service as an assistant pastor and a senior pastor before coming here.

name: Cranesville Kids' Club
description: An exciting childrens' program for all children 4-11.

name: Precious Metals
description: A ministry for those 55 and older within the Cranesville Bible Church
body_content: Each month those 55 and older gather at a local restaurant for food and fellowship.  This group is an active group of lively individuals, who seek to honor the Lord by encouraging each other and by developing outreach and activities for the church.
leader_bio: Thora has served at the church secretary for over ten years.  In addition she has served as the church accountant and bookkeeper.  She has a great burden to be an encouragement to others within the church, and as such is a key organizer for the Precious Metals group.
